member.name: T:System.IO.SafeTraversal.Core.SafeTraversal
member.summary: Core class to perform all traversal operations.

member.name: M:System.IO.SafeTraversal.Core.SafeTraversal.GetFiles(System.IO.DirectoryInfo)
member.summary: Iterates files within top level directories.

member.name: M:System.IO.SafeTraversal.Core.SafeTraversal.GetFiles(System.IO.DirectoryInfo,System.IO.SearchOption)
member.summary: Iterates files using search option.
member.param: Specifies whether to search the current directory, or the current directory and all subdirectories.

member.name: M:System.IO.SafeTraversal.Core.SafeTraversal.GetFiles(System.IO.DirectoryInfo,System.IO.SearchOption,System.Func{System.IO.FileInfo,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Iterates files using search option and custom filter.
member.param: Specifies whether to search the current directory, or the current directory and all subdirectories.
Custom filter to filter files based on condition.

member.summary: Iteratess files using search option and filters based on the common size

member.summary: Iterates files using search option and filters based on search file by name option.
member.param: Specifies whether to search the current directory, or the current directory and all subdirectories.
Specified option to filter files based on the name.

member.name: M:System.IO.SafeTraversal.Core.SafeTraversal.GetFiles(System.IO.DirectoryInfo,System.IO.SearchOption,System.IO.SafeTraversal.Core.SearchFileBySizeOption)
member.summary: Iterates files using search option and filters based on size.

member.name: M:System.IO.SafeTraversal.Core.SafeTraversal.FindParents(System.IO.DirectoryInfo)
member.summary: Find all parents all the way up to the root (ie: C:\ or D:\) from current path.
member.param: Valid path. If path is not found, DirectoryNotFoundException will be thrown.
member.returns: IEnumerable of DirectoryInfo representing all parents. Null if current path is a root.

member.name: M:System.IO.SafeTraversal.Core.SafeTraversal.FindParents(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Find all parents all the way up to the root (ie: C:\ or D:\) from current path.
member.param: Valid file location. If file is not found, FileNotFoundException will be thrown.
member.returns: IEnumerable of DirectoryInfo representing all parents.

member.name: T:System.IO.SafeTraversal.Core.SafeTraversalDirectorySearchOptions
member.summary: An option class to specify more than one search criteria for directories searching.

member.name: T:System.IO.SafeTraversal.Core.Helpers
member.summary: Helpers class for System.IO.SafeTraversal

member.name: M:System.IO.SafeTraversal.Core.Helpers.FindParents(System.IO.DirectoryInfo)
member.summary: Find all parents all the way up to the root (ie: C:\ or D:\) from current path.
member.param: Valid path. If path is not found, DirectoryNotFoundException will be thrown.
member.returns: IEnumerable of DirectoryInfo representing all parents. Null if current path is a root.

member.name: M:System.IO.SafeTraversal.Core.Helpers.FindParents(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Find all parents all the way up to the root (ie: C:\ or D:\) from current path.
member.param: Valid file location. If file is not found, FileNotFoundException will be thrown.
member.returns: IEnumerable of DirectoryInfo representing all parents.
